abstract: California Technology Assessment Forum says there is insufficient evidence to show that hip resurfacing is safe and effective alternative to hip replacement surgery, reversing earlier stance.
snippet: The California Technology Assessment Forum reversed its stance on a technique known as hip resurfacing, citing insufficient evidence regarding the surgery’s safety and efficacy.
lead_paragraph: The California Technology Assessment Forum reversed its stance on a technique known as hip resurfacing, citing insufficient evidence regarding the surgery’s safety and efficacy.

headline.main: Hip Surgery Option Loses Key Backer
headline.print_headline: Hip Surgery Option Loses Key Backer
headline.seo: Hip Resurfacing Operation Loses Important Endorsement
